EmailTemplate.name: Training Workflow Email Template
EmailTemplate.Body:
$identityDisplayName,
$launcher changed the following for user: $identityDisplayName
$attribute_cause
- IdentityIQ System

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Changes to your Identity were processed
